api_list.name: HOW TO RECOVER FUNDS FROM NOVATECH FX: GEARHEAD ENGINEERS
api_list.description: I am a victim of the renowned Novatech Fx pyramid scheme that did away with millions of dollars from innocent investors. I joined the platform on 11th September 2023 after giving in to the wave. I remember the last significant message was on January 24th, 2023 where the admin on the platform shared that due to the high volume of cash-out requests, investors may have to wait for payments. Ever since that date, I experienced torture trying to withdraw my money. I tried reporting the case to every law enforcement possible but they were not able to do anything about it. Instead, I was put on a list along with hundreds of other victims in California. I joined a WhatsApp group formed for Novatech victims with the aim of getting updates but months went by without any valid lead. I almost gave up until someone sent leads to a cybersecurity company called GearHead Engineers and mentioned that they have been a great help in his case. I contacted them with my details and I say it felt like a dream when they told me to wait for 12 hours and actually received my full investment into my account. I’m now sharing this hoping all victims of Novatech Fx get help from GearHead Engineers Organization. Make sure to contact them through the contact details displayed on the website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://how-to-recover-funds-from-novatech-fx-gearhead-engineers.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "how-to-recover-funds-from-novatech-fx-gearhead-engineers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
